name: Tango Traffic
overview:
Tango Traffic is the first traffic network dedicated to delivering accurate, comprehensive traffic 24/7 on television, internet and mobile. Now for the first time, you can watch live, hosted traffic reports on TV, 24/7, as well as personalize your experience by designating your favorite routes and streaming those route reports to your computer or mobile devices. Tango Traffic will be available on WPHL-TVâ€™s (PHL17) digital channel 17.4, Comcast channel 253 and Verizon Fios.

Todayâ€™s consumer demands actionable information â€“ what they want, when and where they want it. Established 24/7 information franchises for news, sports and weather have become ingrained in the lifestyles and culture of how we live, work and play.Tango Traffic serves the need for a 24/7 traffic network, reducing the stress level for millions of drivers and creating safer, happier commutes.
